final_summary: The style should be improved by incorporating more distinct geometric shapes and fragmented perspectives in the figures, simplifying the artwork into abstract forms, and adjusting the color palette to include more muted tones alongside vibrant highlights to better align with the Cubist movement. The content should include overlapping geometric elements and a more abstract representation of figures, while removing any overly realistic elements that detract from the overall abstraction and fragmentation characteristic of Cubism.The style should be improved by simplifying the vibrant background and focusing on the main subjects to ensure they stand out. The content should include a playful depiction of a dog and a cat in boxing poses, while removing the unrelated boxers entirely to align with the intended theme.
